metadata.title: CVE-2019-19947 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel through 5.4.6, there are information leaks ofuninitialized memory to a USB device in thedrivers/net/can/usb/kvaser_usb/kvaser_usb_leaf.c driver, akaCID-da2311a6385c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19947` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-115-generic - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-4.15.0-115-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-4.15.0-115-lowlatency - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-115-generic - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-115-lowlatency - 4.15.0-115.116
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-40-generic - 5.3.0-40.32~18.04.1
